Key Match Events: Kyle Hendricks threw 7 1/3 scoreless innings in the Cubs' 3-0 win against the Reds.
Kyle Hendricks was relieved in the eighth inning to a standing ovation from Cubs fans.
Post-Match Reflections: Kyle Hendricks expressed feeling all the emotions and feeling lucky and happy after the game.
The game could be Kyle Hendricks' last with the Cubs as he is set to test free agency for the first time.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Aerosmith's 'Sweet Emotion' played as Kyle Hendricks was relieved, a song associated with his entrances.
